name: Flappy Egg Drop Free Fall
description:
This flappy chicken is a natural, grass-fed, cage-free chicken.*
It only lays healthy organic chicken eggs.**
It lays a lot of eggs, really fast.
Organic eggs are the best, so catch as many as you can.
Even earn a gold medal, just like in the Olympics.***

Catch as many falling eggs as you can from the flappy chicken bird flying crazily above. The more you catch the higher your score. Catch enough and get a bronze, silver or gold medal.

simple.
addictive.
fun.
enjoy.

#flappyeggdrop

* We actually found it wounded in a desert next to a strange upside down cactus. So, it may have been caged at some point in its life. Also, a few times we fed the chicken corn. It eats bugs too, and it doesn't seem to like eating grass. But usually it's a natural, grass-fed, cage-free chicken.

** Sometimes the eggs don't look or smell so healthy.

*** You will not really get an Olympic gold medal from playing this game.
